projectInfo.title: Handless Hairdrier
projectInfo.introduction: Modeling, rendering and presentation assignment in SolidWorks. The idea is based on Dyson's blade-less fan technology. Dyson hid a smaller fan underneath that sucks in and vents air through.

categories.name: Folio
categories.description: Default post category. Use this Category for project Posts. These will not show up in the Stream
categories.category_description: Default post category. Use this Category for project Posts. These will not show up in the Stream

content.rendered: Modeling, rendering and presentation assignment in SolidWorks. The idea is based on Dyson’s blade-less fan technology. Dyson hid a smaller fan underneath that sucks in and vents air through.
